points: What makes our SAP FICO course in Nagpur stand out is the focus on real-time learning.

roadMap.title: Introduction
items: What is Data analytics?
Data Analytics course
Data Analytics certification
Data Analytics jobs in india
Data Analytics jobs

roadMap.title: Define Objectives and Scope
roadMap.description: Setting the foundation for your analysis
items: Clearly outline the goals and objectives of your data analytics initiative.
Identify the key questions you want to answer or the problems you want to solve.
Define the scope of your analysis, including the data sources and time period.

roadMap.title: Data Collection and Integration
items: Identify relevant data sources and gather the necessary datasets.
Cleanse and preprocess the data to ensure accuracy and consistency.
Integrate data from different sources to create a comprehensive dataset for analysis.

roadMap.title: Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA)
items: Perform EDA to understand the characteristics of the data.
Identify patterns, trends, and outliers that may impact the analysis.
Use visualization techniques to communicate insights effectively.

roadMap.title: Modeling and Analysis
items: Select appropriate analytical models based on the nature of the problem.
Train and validate models using historical data.
Apply the models to new data for predictive or descriptive analysis.

roadMap.title: Interpretation and Communication
items: Interpret the results of the analysis in the context of the business objectives.
Clearly communicate findings to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
Provide actionable insights and recommendations based on the analysis.

roadMap.title: Continuous Improvement and Optimization
items: Establish mechanisms for continuous monitoring of data quality and model performance.
Iterate on the analysis based on feedback and changing business requirements.
Explore new data sources and advanced analytics techniques for continuous improvement.

roadMap.title: Resume Preparation
roadMap.description: Crafting an effective data analytics resume
items: Include keywords.
How to prepare resume.
How to prepare resume for freshers.
Show impact.
Include soft skills.
Be unique.

trainingSyllabus.title: Python Basics
subpoints: Introduction of python for data analysis
Pre-define function in python and its use
String data type and its operation
Integer data type and its operation
List data type and its operation
Tuple data type and its operation
Set data type and its operation
Dictionary data type and its operation
If, else and elif condition and nested condition
For loop and while loop and nested loop with condition
trainingSyllabus.description: Fundamentals of Python programming for data analysis

trainingSyllabus.title: Python Library
trainingSyllabus.description: Essential Python libraries for data science

trainingSyllabus.title: Statistics
subpoints: Stats Definition: I. Descriptive II. Inferential

trainingSyllabus.title: Power BI
subpoints: Introduction of Power BI and its component
Power View: Creating and customizing visualization
Power Query: Data preparation and transformation using Power Query
Integration of Power BI with database
Power BI Service: Sharing and publishing

trainingSyllabus.title: Data Analytics End to End Project

reviews.name: Vikram MANKAR
reviews.review: I enrolled in the Data Analytics course at IT Accurate Institute, Nagpur, and it was a game-changer for me. The instructors were knowledgeable. the curriculum was comprehensive, and the hands-on projects really enhanced my skills. I highly recommend it to anyone looking to delve into the world of data analytics.

reviews.name: Aditi YADAV
reviews.review: The Data Analytics course at IT Accurate Institute was a fantastic experience. The instructors were patient and always willing to help. The real-world applications and case studies made the concepts easy to grasp. I feel well-prepared to apply my skills in the professional arena.

reviews.name: Vedant JAIN
reviews.review: IT Accurate Institute's Data Analytics course was worth every penny. The curriculum was up-to-date with industry standards, and the practical approach to learning made it enjoyable. The institute's support system is commendable, and I now feel confident in my ability to handle complex data analytics tasks.

reviews.name: Shaurya R.

The interactive sessions and group projects allowed for a dynamic learning experience. I appreciate the institute's commitment to fostering a collaborative and supportive learning environment.

reviews.name: Atharv SHIRSAGAR
reviews.review: I had a great time at IT Accurate Institute's Data Analytics course. The instructors were not only knowledgeable but also passionate about the subject, which made the classes more engaging. The practical approach, using real- world data, gave me a solid foundation to build upon.

reviews.name: Aditi JOSE
reviews.review: The Data Analytics course at IT Accurate Institute exceeded my expectations. The institute's emphasis on practical skills development, along with theoretical knowledge, set it apart. The career guidance and placement assistance provided were an added bonus. I'm confident in my ability to apply what I've learned.
